about.about__personalstatement__text: Senior Web Manager / Developer with 18+ years of professional experience in website creation, development and management. In-depth knowledge of Web Design and Development as well as broad knowledge of software and application development accompanied by creative design, analytical and marketing skill sets. Hard working, motivated and passionate technologist with exemplary attendance and time keeping.

contact-form.contact__text: AWS API Gateway is the endpoint this form POSTs to and it triggers an AWS SNS which in turns sends the contents of the form to me via an email!
contact-form.post_success: Thank you for gettin in touch. Your message should now have been delivered and I will be in touch shortly.
contact-form.post_failure: Oops! An error occured and your message could not be sent.
